testcase.classname: Search for iPhones on Flipkart website
testcase.name: Search for iPhone mobile having a maximum price of INR 40000 on Flipkart website
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser..........................................................passed And Goto Flipkart.com.......................................................passed When User search for iPhones mobile.........................................passed And Having maximum price of INR 50000.......................................passed Then Retrive and Save device model, Storage capacity and customer rating....passed
